General.Name: Gyeongnam Steel Co. Ltd
General.Description: Gyeongnam Steel Co., Ltd engages in shearing, cutting, and processing of coil products. It is also involved in the sale of coils and sheet metal; and real estate rental business. The company was formerly known as Samhyun Steel and changed its name to Gyeongnam Steel Co. Ltd in 1995. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Changwon-si, South Korea.

4.Name: Choi  Moon-Gyung
4.Title: Director of Production Division, Exec. Advisor and Director
